Reviews.Title: Sim card?
Reviews.Author: barbadian
Reviews.Content: Does the Sprint Blackberry 8530 Curve Cell Phone 3G (Red) has a sim card does it carry one?? I would like to know since i bought a phone and where i live it has no sim card and i then could use it.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: taylor
Reviews.Content: very happy with this purchase. it arrived quickly and was just as described online. works great and is in awesome shape for a used phone. i love my new phone!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Olivia "Olivia"
Reviews.Content: No complaints, everything came with the phone, charger and all. I was very happy with this purchase would recommend to future buyers from this vendor. :-)

Reviews.Title: Not Obsolete, but Long Lasting & Practical
Reviews.Author: Arthur Ashendorf "OrangeMath"
Reviews.Content: If all you want to do is check emails and texts, then this works easily and well.  Old Blackberry's are underrated. They do what's necessary very quickly.  If you want Apps, go elsewhere.  Google support is enough.

Reviews.Title: Red Blackberry Curve 8530-Sprint
Reviews.Author: Cats4lorie
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  I actually tried the new Blackberry Q10 and hated it so much, I sent it back and bought this phone.  It is just the right size, easy to type on the keyboard.  I enlarged the font some so it is very easy to see, I can't believe how super fast the Internet speed is.  That blows me away.  I added a Micro SD card and some pictures off of my computer for different wallpapers.  It has a good battery and came with lots of apps but I'm going to get more from Blackberry World.  GREAT phone for anyone who is NOT into the touch screen phones.

Reviews.Title: great phone!
Reviews.Author: sara torres
Reviews.Content: I  was looking for a good phone to replace my old one that broke....I have never had a blackberry before so I was a little scared...but I absolutlely love my blackberry now.Didnt have any problems connecting it with sprint...it was fast and easy...The phone arrived really fast..a day before I was expecting it....

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Osvaldina
Reviews.Content: Awful, phone stopped working after a month ...first the charger was wrecked, then the phone blacked out on me, it sd it was in good conditions..

Reviews.Title: Agradecida con la atención y respuestas
Reviews.Author: Andrea Leon
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately when you select the purchase of this article, I didn't mind dealing with a team that operated only in CDMA and Sprint phones. I live in Latin America and get you a week of buying it. To write to my local telefonías to give out my number, it was impossible because here they not homologated foreign serials for CDMA GSM only. I immediately communicate with the seller explaining what happened and uncomplicated replied that there was no problem, that would return it to them and once received they came to my refund. So I did, the disbursement today 10-07-2011 informed me that it is done and I expect to see it taken into account. WIDELY RECOMMEND THIS SELLER IS HONEST PEOPLE AND THAT THEY ACT IN GOOD FAITH. FOLLOW, AS WELL. THE WELCOME. CARACAS-VENEZUELA

Reviews.Title: ESTE CELULAR ME LO VENDIERON Y ESTA DECLARADO ROBADO
Reviews.Author: Rosa Avila
Reviews.Content: COMPRE ESTE CELULAR CON USTEDES DE ABDEL ON AMAZON.COM Y ESTA DECLARADO ROBADO Y AL LLEGAR AQUI EN VENEZUELA NO LO PUDE ACTIVAR POR ESTAR DECLARADO ROBADO, DEBERIAN TENER CUIDADO CON LO QUE VENDEN PORQUE NO HAY NADIE QUE ME RESPONDA POR ESTE PROBLEMA

Reviews.Title: de lo peor!!
Reviews.Author: luz lopez
Reviews.Content: lo uso para sostener la puerta en dias de viento xq fue para lo quedo por que ni funciona muy maloo!!! no lo compren por nadaaa !!

Reviews.Title: CLEAN ESN!!!
Reviews.Author: Juan Martinez
Reviews.Content: Overall good condition, Red, and a clean ESN. Ended up selling it later due to the fact i never got to activate it and making an unintentionated profit. I bought it for $46.00 and sold it for $60.00. $14.00 profit.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fast 3G connectivity; BlackBerry OS 5.0; Support for BlackBerry App World; Mac compatibility with BlackBerry Desktop Software for Mac
Brightly colorful 2.6-inch LCD screen; 35-key backlit full QWERTY keyboard; Innovative touch-sensitive optical trackpad
GPS using Sprint Navigation; 2-megapixel camera; Video capture capabilities
Advanced media player for music, pictures and videos; Dedicated media keys smoothly integrated along the top of the handset
Bluetooth 2.1 connectivity with stereo music streaming (A2DP) capabilities; Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g); Memory expansion via microSD card slot
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 8530 Sprint CDMA Cell Phone with 3G, OS 5.0, 2MP Camera, QWERTY Keyboard, GPS and Wi-Fi - Red
